Articles.Content:
<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/f877983c4f5dc185bb3b4a0e8611b711/tumblr_inline_ndrejdMRvC1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><iframe frameborder="0" height="315" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/--LSHBlVQZk" width="420"></iframe></p>

<p>Creating struts outside the VAB? Is this magic? No, this is <strong>marce</strong>'s <a href="http://bit.ly/1x25uZA"><strong>ACTIVESTRUTS</strong></a>. If the old adage is about MOAR boosters and struts, consider this add-on MOAR boosters for your struts. In addition to creating struts in flight, you can use three different usage-based strut lengths, create flexible joints and even tie your Kerbals down to your craft. Not to mention that there are lots of neat config customizations than you play with, too.</p>

<p>Download ActiveStruts<a href="http://bit.ly/1x25uZA"><strong>HERE</strong></a>.</p>
